transcript: I've heard plenty of people say like hey you should respond to every comment it's impossible in the beginning if you get five comments on every video sure then bi Mees but if you have a million and you have more than one a second what do you do you can't physically respond every comment or can't physically respond every damn are you now a bad person whereas before you were a good person no it means that you never owed anyone a response to begin with and saying yes to someone is saying no to the thing that matters most so make sure you know what you're saying yes to
